publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2869 Robert Brown: The Justice of the Peace Court (Sheriffdom of Glasgow and Strathkelvin) Order 2008—That the Justice Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Justice of the Peace Court (Sheriffdom of Glasgow and Strathkelvin) Order 2008 (SSI 2008/328).

S3M-2869 Robert Brown: The Justice of the Peace Court (Sheriffdom of Glasgow and Strathkelvin) Order 2008—That the Justice Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Justice of the Peace Court (Sheriffdom of Glasgow and Strathkelvin) Order 2008 (SSI 2008/328).
